author: wddgit
body:
#### PR description:

The first commit includes only changes from scram build code-format-all and nothing else. I included here core packages that I will be changing in my concurrent IOV pull request, because I want to rebase that on top of this. More PRs for other core packages coming soon.

There were a few addition changes that showed up in code-checks. I had to manually fix one line to get it to compile.

#### PR validation:

The only test I performed was checking that the revised packages compile and build.
title: Framework code format
